Package z21Drive.actions

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Z21Action  
    Z21ActionGetLocoInfo
    Used to retrieve loco status from z21.
    Z21ActionGetSerialNumber
    Mostly used to poll the keepAlive timer, but feel free to use it if you really want to know what is the serial number of your z21...
    Z21ActionLanLogoff
    Used to log off from z21 when shutting down the app.
    Z21ActionSetLocoDrive
    Sent to z21 to make a loco move.
    Z21ActionSetLocoFunction
    Sent to z21 to change a loco function.
